name: ishka-extension-tests
description: Comprehensive testing suite for Ishka Chrome Extension

scripts.test:all: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:functional && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); const PerformanceMonitor = require('./tests/utils/performance-monitor'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); const monitor = new PerformanceMonitor(page); await monitor.runPerformanceTest(); await browser.close(); })()"
scripts.test:full: npm run test:unified && npm run test:performance
